front.title: Extensions to View-based Access Control Model for use with RADIUS

abstract.t: This memo describes a backward compatible extension to the View-basedAccess Control Model for SNMPv3 for use with RADIUS and other AAAservices to provide authorization of MIB database access. Thisextension is intended to be used in conjunction with secure SNMPTransport Models that facilitate RADIUS authentication, such as theSecure Shell Transport Model.
